question: What does the acronym DOM stand for in the context of web development?
Which HTTP method is commonly used to submit data to be processed to a specified resource?
What is the primary purpose of the 'z-index' CSS property?
options: To set the transparency of an element.
To control the order of flex items.
To control the vertical stacking order of elements.
To adjust the space between text characters.
answer: To control the vertical stacking order of elements.
